title: Can neurosciences lead to a neurologist? - Quora

response.answer_text: By this question if you mean “ By studying neurosciences, can I become a neurologist”?, Then the answer is Yes if you are an MD medicine Doctor, and have done DM in Neurology. No other degree in India can make you a clinical neurologist. There are multiple other branches in neurosciences besides Neurology. Its like asking if I study biology can I become a Doctor? Maybe if you are more specific with your question, I could answer.
